sentences.sContent: I found Mark at the hospital, pacing restlessly up and down.
sentences.sCn: 我看见马克在医院里焦躁不安地踱来踱去。

sentences.sContent: Sam stood up and paced the floor, deep in thought.
sentences.sCn: 萨姆站起身，在屋里踱来踱去，全神贯注地思索着。

sentences.sContent: ...the students mentioned only personal concerns such as slowing down the pace of life...
...lie fast pace of life influences everyone...

phrases.pCn: n. 改变习惯；更换口味
v. 领先；起领头作用；定速度
◎(比赛中)采用加速战术，以尽快拖垮对方

words.tran: 步测者；溜蹄的马；定速装置

trans.tranOther: to walk first in one direction and then in another many times, especially because you are nervous
